article: Mother always said I was born to swim. I was _ at the amazing fact. If this was true, then why was I afraid of water? I went to swim every summer, but I made little progress. I was worried and blamed myself several times. When I watched people swimming _ , how I wished I had learnt to swim! The story of how I learnt to swim is dramatic. One summer afternoon, my _ and I went to the swimming pool to swim. While he was _ his clothes, I was wandering along the bank of the pool. Suddenly I heard a voice, " Look out !" and then came a big noise and _ splashes . Just when I was _ the swimmer's skills, I slipped into the pool! I was so afraid that I _ at once! But the water kept coming towards me and I _ lots of it. I was moving upside down and trying to reach the _ . I was struggling very hard to keep my head _ the water. A(n) _ was like a hundred years to me. To my surprise, I was able to keep the style! Just then, my father saw me and he seemed to be _ . He then said, "Calm down, just _ your arms and legs like this. Right!" And I _ it! I finally learnt to swim! You can't imagine how happy I was and I wanted to _ for joy! From this experience I learnt that one's power is _ . Sometimes you could show that power in an emergency. If you believe that, you will discover the power _ within yourself and achieve your goals. And one has to stay calm when it's _ . To calm down helps you to think clearly and make the best decision.
